channel.title: Drafts on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Drafts on Home

item.title: Cooking
item.description: Rice Ingredients 100g of rice salt and pepper 200ml of water Steps: Wash the rice 3 to 4 times Boil the water Add the rice in boiling water for 10 minutes with the lid on Stop the fire and leave it with the lid on for 10 minutes

item.title: Jokes
item.description: Dad jokes I asked my date to meet me at the gym today. She didn’t show up. That’s when I knew we weren’t gonna work out. Today a man knocked on my door and asked for a small donation to the local swimming pool. I gave him a glass of water.
